body_html: @carpodaster Regarding the labels: I like the idea of explaining them in a separate paragraph (maybe at the end, like in the atom example)? Then we can link to the separate section about labels every time we need to. This has the advantage that the list would probably be easier to maintain than if the label info was scattered across the document.
